answers.answer: The last time I got my 4D scan the lady told me my baby was measuring bigger then what she was supposed to. I went to my ob and he said by pressing on my abdomen I was where I needed to be. He said some causes of big babies are gestational diabetes (which I didn't have), or if you have a family history of big babies. He said it has a lot to do with your partner as well.
My son is measuring bigger at my last ultrasound they changed my due date.  He's just growing fast my husband an I are both tall an so is our daughter so our son was bond to be big as well
Your diet. You're eating/drinking too much sugar
